message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit more than $90. I can do $110, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit higher than $110. Can you meet me at $100?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I can meet you halfway between $110 and $100, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than $105. Can you meet me at $95?

I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is the price I mentioned earlier that I was willing to sell it to John for. I think it's a fair price, considering the product's value.
I understand you think $100 is a fair price, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $95 and $100, so I'll offer $97.50. Can you meet me at this price?
I'm not willing to meet you at $97.50, Bob. I think I've been flexible enough. I'm willing to sell it to you for $99, which is still a good compromise, but I'm not going any lower.
I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I'm really interested in this product. I'm willing to meet you at $92.50. This is my final offer, please let me know if you can accept it.
